actions.description: The giant makes two Scythe or Soul Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Scythe

actions.description: 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target has the frightened condition, the giant gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.
actions.name: Soul Bolt
